Header: Donald Trump to arrive at Stansted Airport for UK state visit
Content: US President Donald Trump will arrive in the UK for a three-day official state visit. Air Force One is expected to land at London Stansted Airport. The Queen will host a state banquet at Buckingham Palace for the president and the First Lady Melania Trump. Protests are planned across the UK during the visit – including rallies in London, Manchester, Belfast, Birmingham and Nottingham. Ahead of his visit, President Trump told he was backing Tory leadership contender Boris Johnson to be the next UK prime minister. He also told that Brexit Party leader Nigel Farage should be involved in the government’s negotiations to leave the EU.
